name: CRUSH & SQUASH
description:
Shoot or squash the monsters to defend the earth.
You can break the wall,floor,ground,building everything in this game.
Power-up items for your health and weapon will show up after killing the monster.
You take those items and you get health back or your weapon upgrade.
You can fly in the air by using jet,but it consume your fuel.
Fuel is increased with time.
Enjoy beautiful explosion, smoke, flames,pleasant destruction.


Key operation
WASD
move (W key for jet propulsion)
1 to 5 keys
switch the weapon
Esc Quit from game, close the app.
Alt + Enter toggle fullscreen and window mode.
Mouse operation
Mouse pointer is aiming coursor for weapons
Left button fire
